@pjkmorris How have you noticed though? I wouldn't notice if anyone unfollowed me. Or do you have that app that tells you?

@bbcclass @BBCOne Any chance we'll be seeing this in New Zealand? @Patrick_Ness
@helen_lehndorf Hell yes! Trying to keep my kids informed about the world without also scaring them to death.
@MoataTamaira I'm watching on demand and I have ads! Well promos anyway.
Went to watch the Sherlock I recorded last night only to find my 7 year old had recorded 21 hours of rugby Sevens. #partrecorded #diskfull
@lightyouonfire But not one you should be in any way concerned about! Trump for a profile pic.
@lightyouonfire No it was just an abusive one not a questioning one. Serves me right. Off to wash my hands.
@lightyouonfire Argh I went to click on a tweet to see what lowlife was saying nasty things to you & I accidentally liked it! I don't like!
@isaac_davison @secondzeit Not good enough!
@SophieFern Well that's a pity.
I slept in. Has the PM said anything yet?

@AJFitzwater oh for a minute I read that as "Little talk" and I was wondering who you were following!
@pjkmorris I guess mine's more a 'how can the system allow this and not that' rhetorical-type question, which can't be answered in a tweet!
@LaurieFleming @testpatern Well that is just fucked up.
@ClaireMabey I could basically just read full time. Pesky jobs and families!
How can Trump do all this in one week when Obama couldn't do anything about gun control in 8 years?
@ClaireMabey Yes! It's great. You can spy on what your friends are reading, and have conversations etc. Also logging read and TBR is helpful
@ClaireMabey No I haven't to either of them. SO MANY BOOKS
@ClaireMabey Are you on Goodreads?
@ClaireMabey Also, I've really been enjoying peronsal essays & memoir lately - breaking out of my diet of mostly fiction. Any recommends?
@ClaireMabey I feel like this is my year to find some quiet space in my newly organised home office & maybe even learn how to write again,
@ClaireMabey Mind you, who knows when I'll get to read them. Currently reading Dying by Corey Taylor and a million children's awards books!
@ClaireMabey Good idea. I'm getting the Oliver and the de Botton. I have the Gleick (not read yet).
@banquotrilogy @netflix Yes except that it is not bingeable - releasing one episode a week. Have you checked out Frequency? That's all there
